headlines.description: Fulham were relegated from the Premier League after collapsing to a 4-1 defeat at Watford on Tuesday.

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Fulham's 24th defeat confirms relegation) 2019/04/02 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Fulham down after 4-1 thrashing at Watford

headlines.description: A pair of Ashley Young yellow cards helped condemn Manchester United to a 2-1 defeat against Wolverhampton on Tuesday night at Molineux.

video.headline: Smalling own goal puts Wolves 2-1 up

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC ONE PLAY (Smalling own goal puts Wolves 2-1 up) 2019/04/02 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Young sent off in Man United loss to Wolves
